nodes.name: initiate
resolveDispute
getData
claimReturn
initiate
resolveDispute
getData
claimReturn

claimReturn(address).details: Claim the return amount of the specified address.

params._user: The address to query the claim return amount of.

claimReturn(address).return: Flag, if 0:cannot claim, 1: Already Claimed, 2: Claimed

getData().return: _marketCurrency bytes32 representing the currency or stock name of the market.minvalue uint[] memory representing the minimum range of all the options of the market.maxvalue uint[] memory representing the maximum range of all the options of the market._optionPrice uint[] memory representing the option price of each option ranges of the market._ethStaked uint[] memory representing the ether staked on each option ranges of the market._plotStaked uint[] memory representing the plot staked on each option ranges of the market._predictionType uint representing the type of market._expireTime uint representing the expire time of the market._predictionStatus uint representing the status of the market.

params._maxValue: The maximum value of middle option range.
params._minValue: The minimum value of middle option range.
params._startTime: The time at which market will create.

resolveDispute(bool,uint256).details: Resolve the dispute if wrong value passed at the time of market result declaration.

params.accepted: The flag defining that the dispute raised is accepted or not
params.finalResult: The final correct value of market currency.
